## Fit the model
```{r setup}
library(mypackage)

dat = mt_cars
m1 <- lm_fit(mpg ~ cyl + disp, data = mt_cars)
```

## Output the detials of the fit
```{r}
lm_detail(m1)
```

## Output the ANOVA table of the fit
```{r}
lm_anova(m1)
```

## Get the SSR of one matrix from some step of lm_fit
```{r}
X <- m1[["X"]]
Y <- m1[["Y"]]
adata <- cbind(Y, X)
ax = adata[,1:3]
lm_anova_fit(ax)
```
